content:
Hi everyone, I'm Shunsuke Ikadai from Japan.

I am currently an undergraduate student majoring in Mathematics. Starting next year, I will be a Master's student in Computer Science. My main interests are mathematical logic, specifically proof theory and non-classical logic, and its application.

I discovered Lean while researching automated theorem proving and started using it recently. So far, I have read roughly up to Chapter 5 of "Theorem Proving in Lean 4" and have also played the Natural Number Game, and then have started to understand how to use Lean just a little.

Eventually, I would like to contribute to the formalization of logic in Lean.
Through this community, I also want to get used to communicating in English.

Nice to meet you!
